com.mesosphere.sdk.dcos.clients

Class CertificateAuthorityClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.dcos.clients.CertificateAuthorityClient

  • public class CertificateAuthorityClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents abstraction over DC/OS Certificate Authority.
    See Also:
    https://docs.mesosphere.com/1.9/networking/tls-ssl/ca-api/
